text: Sierra Leone at the Olympics is a history which began in 1968. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for Sierra Leone is SLE. ==History== Teams from Sierra Leone have been to every Summer Olympic Games held since 1968, with the exception of 1972 and 1976. They have never won an Olympic medal. No athletes from Sierra Leone have been in any Winter Olympic Games. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Sierra Leone profile at London2012.com * IOC page Category:Sport in Sierra Leone Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Sierra Leone at the Olympics
